lead_paragraph: With a reputation for being "no go" areas, Rio de Janeiro's favelas are an unlikely attraction for visitors but a project to map the city's slums aims to draw in business from some of the thousands of spectators expected at the Olympic Games.

headline.print_headline: Ahead of Olympics, Brazilians Map Neglected Favelas to Boost Business
headline.main: Ahead of Olympics, Brazilians Map Neglected Favelas to Boost Business

snippet: With a reputation for being "no go" areas, Rio de Janeiro's favelas are an unlikely attraction for visitors but a project to map the city's slums aims to draw in business from some of the thousands of spectators expected at the Olympic Games....
